description: This schema represents a consent document.

id.description: The identifier of this consent document. We strongly recommend this to be a globally unique value.

creation_date_time.description: The date time this consent document was created.

withdrawn.description: Whether or not the consent is currently withdrawn

survey_id.description: The identifier of the consent document being consented to.

signature_id.description: The identifier of the signature used to consent to the document
